result.eng: Have you ever seen such a thing?

result.eng: Where would you get such a thing?

result.eng: Who would pay for such badly made clothes?
result.ga: Cé a d'íocfadh airgead ar éadaí a bhí déanta chomh dona sin

result.html: Ní ann don duine sinNo such person exists.
result.ponchtml: Ní ann don duine sinNo such person exists.

result.eng: It is not appropriate for the police to ask me such questions.
result.ga: Ní cóir do na póilíní ceisteanna mar seo a chur orm

result.ponchtml: Ní cóir do na póilíní ceisteanna mar seo a ċur ormIt is not appropriate for the police to ask me such questions.

result.eng: We need a professional writer, such as a journalist.
result.ga: Scríbhneoir proifisiúnta atá uainn dála iriseora
result.orig: Scríbhneoir proifisiúnta atá uainn dála iriseora
result.html: Scríbhneoir proifisiúnta atá uainn dála iriseoraWe need a professional writer, such as a journalist.
result.ponchtml: Scríḃneoir proifisiúnta atá uainn dála iriseoraWe need a professional writer, such as a journalist.

result.eng: They live on healthy food such as fish and vegetables.
result.ga: Tá siad ag maireachtáil ar bhia folláin ar nós iasc agus glasraí
result.orig: Tá siad ag maireachtáil ar bhia folláin ar nós iasc agus glasraí
result.html: Tá siad ag maireachtáil ar bhia folláin ar nós iasc agus glasraíThey live on healthy food such as fish and vegetables.
result.ponchtml: Tá siad ag maireaċtáil ar ḃia folláin ar nós iasc agus glasraíThey live on healthy food such as fish and vegetables.

result.eng: People started being evacuated from tall buildings around the country such as Sears Tower in Chicago.
result.ga: Tosaíodh ag aslonnú daoine as foirgnimh mhóra timpeall na tíre mar Túr Sears in Siceágo
result.orig: Tosaíodh ag aslonnú daoine as foirgnimh mhóra timpeall na tíre mar Túr Sears in Siceágo
result.html: Tosaíodh ag aslonnú daoine as foirgnimh mhóra timpeall na tíre mar Túr Sears in SiceágoPeople started being evacuated from tall buildings around the country such as Sears Tower in Chicago.
result.ponchtml: Tosaíoḋ ag aslonnú daoine as foirgniṁ ṁóra timpeall na tíre mar Túr Sears in SiceágoPeople started being evacuated from tall buildings around the country such as Sears Tower in Chicago.

result.eng: In addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.
result.ga: Anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáil
result.orig: Anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáil
result.html: Anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáilIn addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.
result.ponchtml: Anuas ar sin ní ṫig éalú ó ġnáṫċúraimí an tsaoil a ṫiteann ar ḋuine ar nós airgead a ṫuilleaṁ nó clann a ṫógáilIn addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.

result.eng: You wouldn't expect the same opiniated depth from them as you would from longer posts such as blogs or online columns.
result.ga: Ní bheifeá ag súil leis an doimhneacht chéanna tuairimíochta uathu is a bheadh ó phostálacha níba fhaide ar nós blag nó colún ar líne
result.orig: Ní bheifeá ag súil leis an doimhneacht chéanna tuairimíochta uathu is a bheadh ó phostálacha níba fhaide ar nós blag nó colún ar líne
result.html: Ní bheifeá ag súil leis an doimhneacht chéanna tuairimíochta uathu is a bheadh ó phostálacha níba fhaide ar nós blag nó colún ar líneYou wouldn't expect the same opiniated depth from them as you would from longer posts such as blogs or online columns.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃeifeá ag súil leis an doiṁneaċt ċéanna tuairimíoċta uaṫu is a ḃeaḋ ó ṗostálaċa níba ḟaide ar nós blag nó colún ar líneYou wouldn't expect the same opiniated depth from them as you would from longer posts such as blogs or online columns.

result.eng: Be sensible and don't say such things.
result.ga: Bíodh ciall agat agus fág an cineál sin cainte le rá ag duine inteacht eile
